data.description: Nanogrid Air has been detected on your network. Confirm setup to access real-time monitoring and control features.

error.not_responding: Nanogrid Air is not responding. Ensure the device is powered and connected to your network, then try again.
error.single_instance_allowed: Only one instance of Nanogrid Air can be configured. Please manage your existing device from the Integrations page.

abort.already_configured: A Nanogrid Air device is already configured. If you need to reconfigure, please remove the existing instance first.
abort.not_responding: Connection attempt failed as Nanogrid Air did not respond. Check the device's network connectivity and power status.
